00071 typedef struct Eyedropper {
00072     PointerRNA ptr;
00073     PropertyRNA *prop;
00074     int index;
00075 } Eyedropper;
00076 
00077 static int eyedropper_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00078 {
00079     Eyedropper *eye;
00080     
00081     op->customdata = eye = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Eyedropper), "Eyedropper");
00082     
00083     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &eye->ptr, &eye->prop, &eye->index);
00084     
00085     return (eye->ptr.data && eye->prop && RNA_property_editable(&eye->ptr, eye->prop));
00086 }
00087  
00088 static void eyedropper_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00089 {
00090     WM_cursor_restore(CTX_wm_window(C));
00091     
00092     if (op->customdata)
00093         MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00094     op->customdata = NULL;
00095 }
00096 
00097 static int eyedropper_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00098 {
00099     eyedropper_exit(C, op);
00100     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void eyedropper_sample(bContext *C, Eyedropper *eye, int mx, int my)
00104 {
00105     if (RNA_property_type(eye->prop) == PROP_FLOAT) {
00106         Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00107         const int color_manage = scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT;
00108         float col[4];
00109     
00110         RNA_property_float_get_array(&eye->ptr, eye->prop, col);
00111         
00112         glReadBuffer(GL_FRONT);
00113         glReadPixels(mx, my, 1, 1, GL_RGB, GL_FLOAT, col);
00114         glReadBuffer(GL_BACK);
00115     
00116         if (RNA_property_array_length(&eye->ptr, eye->prop) < 3) return;
00117 
00118         /* convert from screen (srgb) space to linear rgb space */
00119         if (color_manage && RNA_property_subtype(eye->prop) == PROP_COLOR)
00120             srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(col, col);
00121         
00122         RNA_property_float_set_array(&eye->ptr, eye->prop, col);
00123         
00124         RNA_property_update(C, &eye->ptr, eye->prop);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 /* main modal status check */
00129 static int eyedropper_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00130 {
00131     Eyedropper *eye = (Eyedropper *)op->customdata;
00132     
00133     switch (event->type) {
00134         case ESCKEY:
00135         case RIGHTMOUSE:
00136             return eyedropper_cancel(C, op);
00137         case LEFTMOUSE:
00138             if (event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00139                 eyedropper_sample(C, eye, event->x, event->y);
00140                 eyedropper_exit(C, op);
00141                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00142             }
00143             break;
00144     }
00145     
00146     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00147 }
00148 
00149 /* Modal Operator init */
00150 static int eyedropper_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00151 {
00152     /* init */
00153     if (eyedropper_init(C, op)) {
00154         WM_cursor_modal(CTX_wm_window(C), BC_EYEDROPPER_CURSOR);
00155 
00156         /* add temp handler */
00157         WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00158         
00159         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00160     }
00161     else {
00162         eyedropper_exit(C, op);
00163         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 /* Repeat operator */
00168 static int eyedropper_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00169 {
00170     /* init */
00171     if (eyedropper_init(C, op)) {
00172         
00173         /* do something */
00174         
00175         /* cleanup */
00176         eyedropper_exit(C, op);
00177         
00178         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00179     }
00180     else {
00181         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 static int eyedropper_poll(bContext *C)
00186 {
00187     if (!CTX_wm_window(C)) return 0;
00188     else return 1;
00189 }

00191 static void UI_OT_eyedropper(wmOperatorType *ot)
00192 {
00193     /* identifiers */
00194     ot->name = "Eyedropper";
00195     ot->idname = "UI_OT_eyedropper";
00196     ot->description = "Sample a color from the Blender Window to store in a property";
00197     
00198     /* api callbacks */
00199     ot->invoke = eyedropper_invoke;
00200     ot->modal = eyedropper_modal;
00201     ot->cancel = eyedropper_cancel;
00202     ot->exec = eyedropper_exec;
00203     ot->poll = eyedropper_poll;
00204     
00205     /* flags */
00206     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
00207     
00208     /* properties */
00209 }

00235 /* Copy Data Path Operator ------------------------ */
00236 
00237 static int copy_data_path_button_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00238 {
00239     PointerRNA ptr;
00240     PropertyRNA *prop;
00241     char *path;
00242     int success = 0;
00243     int index;
00244 
00245     /* try to create driver using property retrieved from UI */
00246     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &ptr, &prop, &index);
00247 
00248     if (ptr.id.data && ptr.data && prop) {
00249         path = RNA_path_from_ID_to_property(&ptr, prop);
00250         
00251         if (path) {
00252             WM_clipboard_text_set(path, FALSE);
00253             MEM_freeN(path);
00254         }
00255     }
00256 
00257     /* since we're just copying, we don't really need to do anything else...*/
00258     return (success) ? OPERATOR_FINISHED : OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00259 }

00271 
00272     /* flags */
00273     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
00274 }

00276 /* Reset to Default Values Button Operator ------------------------ */
00277 
00278 static int reset_default_button_poll(bContext *C)
00279 {
00280     PointerRNA ptr;
00281     PropertyRNA *prop;
00282     int index;
00283 
00284     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &ptr, &prop, &index);
00285     
00286     return (ptr.data && prop && RNA_property_editable(&ptr, prop));
00287 }
00288 
00289 static int reset_default_button_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00290 {
00291     PointerRNA ptr;
00292     PropertyRNA *prop;
00293     int success = 0;
00294     int index, all = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all");
00295 
00296     /* try to reset the nominated setting to its default value */
00297     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &ptr, &prop, &index);
00298     
00299     /* if there is a valid property that is editable... */
00300     if (ptr.data && prop && RNA_property_editable(&ptr, prop)) {
00301         if (RNA_property_reset(&ptr, prop, (all) ? -1 : index)) {
00302             /* perform updates required for this property */
00303             RNA_property_update(C, &ptr, prop);
00304 
00305             /* as if we pressed the button */
00306             uiContextActivePropertyHandle(C);
00307 
00308             success = 1;
00309         }
00310     }
00311 
00312     /* Since we don't want to undo _all_ edits to settings, eg window
00313      * edits on the screen or on operator settings.
00314      * it might be better to move undo's inline - campbell */
00315     if (success) {
00316         ID *id = ptr.id.data;
00317         if (id && ID_CHECK_UNDO(id)) {
00318             /* do nothing, go ahead with undo */
00319         }
00320         else {
00321             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00322         }
00323     }
00324     /* end hack */
00325 
00326     return (success) ? OPERATOR_FINISHED : OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00327 }
00328 
00329 static void UI_OT_reset_default_button(wmOperatorType *ot)
00330 {
00331     /* identifiers */
00332     ot->name = "Reset to Default Value";
00333     ot->idname = "UI_OT_reset_default_button";
00334     ot->description = "Reset this property's value to its default value";
00335 
00336     /* callbacks */
00337     ot->poll = reset_default_button_poll;
00338     ot->exec = reset_default_button_exec;
00339 
00340     /* flags */
00341     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
00342     
00343     /* properties */
00344     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 1, "All", "Reset to default values all elements of the array");
00345 }
00346 
00347 /* Copy To Selected Operator ------------------------ */
00348 
00349 static int copy_to_selected_list(bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, ListBase *lb, int *use_path)
00350 {
00351     *use_path = 0;
00352 
00353     if (RNA_struct_is_a(ptr->type, &RNA_EditBone))
00354         *lb = CTX_data_collection_get(C, "selected_editable_bones");
00355     else if (RNA_struct_is_a(ptr->type, &RNA_PoseBone))
00356         *lb = CTX_data_collection_get(C, "selected_pose_bones");
00357     else if (RNA_struct_is_a(ptr->type, &RNA_Sequence))
00358         *lb = CTX_data_collection_get(C, "selected_editable_sequences");
00359     else {
00360         ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00361 
00362         if (id && GS(id->name) == ID_OB) {
00363             *lb = CTX_data_collection_get(C, "selected_editable_objects");
00364             *use_path = 1;
00365         }
00366         else
00367             return 0;
00368     }
00369     
00370     return 1;
00371 }
00372 
00373 static int copy_to_selected_button_poll(bContext *C)
00374 {
00375     PointerRNA ptr, lptr, idptr;
00376     PropertyRNA *prop, *lprop;
00377     int index, success = 0;
00378 
00379     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &ptr, &prop, &index);
00380 
00381     if (ptr.data && prop) {
00382         char *path = NULL;
00383         int use_path;
00384         CollectionPointerLink *link;
00385         ListBase lb;
00386 
00387         if (!copy_to_selected_list(C, &ptr, &lb, &use_path))
00388             return success;
00389 
00390         if (!use_path || (path = RNA_path_from_ID_to_property(&ptr, prop))) {
00391             for (link = lb.first; link; link = link->next) {
00392                 if (link->ptr.data != ptr.data) {
00393                     if (use_path) {
00394                         lprop = NULL;
00395                         RNA_id_pointer_create(link->ptr.id.data, &idptr);
00396                         RNA_path_resolve(&idptr, path, &lptr, &lprop);
00397                     }
00398                     else {
00399                         lptr = link->ptr;
00400                         lprop = prop;
00401                     }
00402 
00403                     if (lprop == prop) {
00404                         if (RNA_property_editable(&lptr, prop))
00405                             success = 1;
00406                     }
00407                 }
00408             }
00409 
00410             if (path)
00411                 MEM_freeN(path);
00412         }
00413 
00414         BLI_freelistN(&lb);
00415     }
00416 
00417     return success;
00418 }
00419 
00420 static int copy_to_selected_button_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00421 {
00422     PointerRNA ptr, lptr, idptr;
00423     PropertyRNA *prop, *lprop;
00424     int success = 0;
00425     int index, all = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all");
00426 
00427     /* try to reset the nominated setting to its default value */
00428     uiContextActiveProperty(C, &ptr, &prop, &index);
00429     
00430     /* if there is a valid property that is editable... */
00431     if (ptr.data && prop) {
00432         char *path = NULL;
00433         int use_path;
00434         CollectionPointerLink *link;
00435         ListBase lb;
00436 
00437         if (!copy_to_selected_list(C, &ptr, &lb, &use_path))
00438             return success;
00439 
00440         if (!use_path || (path = RNA_path_from_ID_to_property(&ptr, prop))) {
00441             for (link = lb.first; link; link = link->next) {
00442                 if (link->ptr.data != ptr.data) {
00443                     if (use_path) {
00444                         lprop = NULL;
00445                         RNA_id_pointer_create(link->ptr.id.data, &idptr);
00446                         RNA_path_resolve(&idptr, path, &lptr, &lprop);
00447                     }
00448                     else {
00449                         lptr = link->ptr;
00450                         lprop = prop;
00451                     }
00452 
00453                     if (lprop == prop) {
00454                         if (RNA_property_editable(&lptr, lprop)) {
00455                             if (RNA_property_copy(&lptr, &ptr, prop, (all) ? -1 : index)) {
00456                                 RNA_property_update(C, &lptr, prop);
00457                                 success = 1;
00458                             }
00459                         }
00460                     }
00461                 }
00462             }
00463 
00464             if (path)
00465                 MEM_freeN(path);
00466         }
00467 
00468         BLI_freelistN(&lb);
00469     }
00470     
00471     return (success) ? OPERATOR_FINISHED : OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00472 }
00473 
00474 static void UI_OT_copy_to_selected_button(wmOperatorType *ot)

00476     /* identifiers */
00477     ot->name = "Copy To Selected";

00487 
00488     /* properties */
00489     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 1, "All", "Reset to default values all elements of the array");
00490 }

00492 /* Reports to Textblock Operator ------------------------ */
00493 
00494 /* FIXME: this is just a temporary operator so that we can see all the reports somewhere 
00495  * when there are too many to display...
00496  */
00497 
00498 static int reports_to_text_poll(bContext *C)
00499 {
00500     return CTX_wm_reports(C) != NULL;
00501 }
00502 
00503 static int reports_to_text_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00504 {
00505     ReportList *reports = CTX_wm_reports(C);
00506     Text *txt;
00507     char *str;
00508     
00509     /* create new text-block to write to */
00510     txt = add_empty_text("Recent Reports");
00511     
00512     /* convert entire list to a display string, and add this to the text-block
00513      *  - if commandline debug option enabled, show debug reports too
00514      *  - otherwise, up to info (which is what users normally see)
00515      */
00516     str = BKE_reports_string(reports, (G.debug & G_DEBUG) ? RPT_DEBUG : RPT_INFO);
00517 
00518     if (str) {
00519         write_text(txt, str);
00520         MEM_freeN(str);
00521 
00522         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00523     }
00524     else {
00525         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00526     }
00527 }
00528

00534     ot->description = "Write the reports ";
00535     
00536     /* callbacks */
00537     ot->poll = reports_to_text_poll;
00538     ot->exec = reports_to_text_exec;
00539 }

00541 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON

00543 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00544 /* EditSource Utility funcs and operator,
00545  * note, this includes utility functions and button matching checks */
00546 
00547 struct uiEditSourceStore {
00548     uiBut but_orig;
00549     GHash *hash;
00550 } uiEditSourceStore;
00551 
00552 struct uiEditSourceButStore {
00553     char py_dbg_fn[FILE_MAX];
00554     int py_dbg_ln;
00555 } uiEditSourceButStore;
00556 
00557 /* should only ever be set while the edit source operator is running */
00558 static struct uiEditSourceStore *ui_editsource_info = NULL;
00559 
00560 int  UI_editsource_enable_check(void)
00561 {
00562     return (ui_editsource_info != NULL);
00563 }
00564 
00565 static void ui_editsource_active_but_set(uiBut *but)
00566 {
00567     BLI_assert(ui_editsource_info == NULL);
00568 
00569     ui_editsource_info = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiEditSourceStore), __func__);
00570     memcpy(&ui_editsource_info->but_orig, but, sizeof(uiBut));
00571 
00572     ui_editsource_info->hash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash,
00573                                              BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp,
00574                                              __func__);
00575 }
00576 
00577 static void ui_editsource_active_but_clear(void)
00578 {
00579     BLI_ghash_free(ui_editsource_info->hash, NULL, (GHashValFreeFP)MEM_freeN);
00580     MEM_freeN(ui_editsource_info);
00581     ui_editsource_info = NULL;
00582 }
00583 
00584 static int ui_editsource_uibut_match(uiBut *but_a, uiBut *but_b)
00585 {
00586 #if 0
00587     printf("matching buttons: '%s' == '%s'\n",
00588            but_a->drawstr, but_b->drawstr);
00589 #endif
00590 
00591     /* this just needs to be a 'good-enough' comparison so we can know beyond
00592      * reasonable doubt that these buttons are the same between redraws.
00593      * if this fails it only means edit-source fails - campbell */
00594     if ((but_a->x1 == but_b->x1) &&
00595         (but_a->x2 == but_b->x2) &&
00596         (but_a->y1 == but_b->y1) &&
00597         (but_a->y2 == but_b->y2) &&
00598         (but_a->type == but_b->type) &&
00599         (but_a->rnaprop == but_b->rnaprop) &&
00600         (but_a->optype == but_b->optype) &&
00601         (but_a->unit_type == but_b->unit_type) &&
00602         (strncmp(but_a->drawstr, but_b->drawstr, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR) == 0))
00603     {
00604         return TRUE;
00605     }
00606     else {
00607         return FALSE;
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 void UI_editsource_active_but_test(uiBut *but)
00612 {
00613     extern void PyC_FileAndNum_Safe(const char **filename, int *lineno);
00614 
00615     struct uiEditSourceButStore *but_store = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiEditSourceButStore), __func__);
00616 
00617     const char *fn;
00618     int lineno = -1;
00619 
00620 #if 0
00621     printf("comparing buttons: '%s' == '%s'\n",
00622            but->drawstr, ui_editsource_info->but_orig.drawstr);
00623 #endif
00624 
00625     PyC_FileAndNum_Safe(&fn, &lineno);
00626 
00627     if (lineno != -1) {
00628         BLI_strncpy(but_store->py_dbg_fn, fn,
00629                     sizeof(but_store->py_dbg_fn));
00630         but_store->py_dbg_ln = lineno;
00631     }
00632     else {
00633         but_store->py_dbg_fn[0] = '\0';
00634         but_store->py_dbg_ln = -1;
00635     }
00636 
00637     BLI_ghash_insert(ui_editsource_info->hash, but, but_store);
00638 }
00639 
00640 /* editsource operator component */
00641 
00642 static int editsource_text_edit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op,
00643                                 char filepath[FILE_MAX], int line)
00644 {
00645     struct Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00646     Text *text;
00647 
00648     for (text = bmain->text.first; text; text = text->id.next) {
00649         if (text->name && BLI_path_cmp(text->name, filepath) == 0) {
00650             break;
00651         }
00652     }
00653 
00654     if (text == NULL) {
00655         text = add_text(filepath, bmain->name);
00656     }
00657 
00658     if (text == NULL) {
00659         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING,
00660                     "file: '%s' can't be opened", filepath);
00661         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00662     }
00663     else {
00664         /* naughty!, find text area to set, not good behavior
00665          * but since this is a dev tool lets allow it - campbell */
00666         ScrArea *sa = BKE_screen_find_big_area(CTX_wm_screen(C), SPACE_TEXT, 0);
00667         if (sa) {
00668             SpaceText *st = sa->spacedata.first;
00669             st->text = text;
00670         }
00671         else {
00672             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_INFO,
00673                         "See '%s' in the text editor", text->id.name + 2);
00674         }
00675 
00676         txt_move_toline(text, line - 1, FALSE);
00677         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
00678     }
00679 
00680     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00681 }
00682 
00683 static int editsource_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00684 {
00685     uiBut *but = uiContextActiveButton(C);
00686 
00687     if (but) {
00688         GHashIterator ghi;
00689         struct uiEditSourceButStore *but_store = NULL;
00690 
00691         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00692         int ret;
00693 
00694         /* needed else the active button does not get tested */
00695         uiFreeActiveButtons(C, CTX_wm_screen(C));
00696 
00697         // printf("%s: begin\n", __func__);
00698 
00699         /* take care not to return before calling ui_editsource_active_but_clear */
00700         ui_editsource_active_but_set(but);
00701 
00702         /* redraw and get active button python info */
00703         ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00704 
00705         for (BLI_ghashIterator_init(&ghi, ui_editsource_info->hash);
00706              !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(&ghi);
00707              BLI_ghashIterator_step(&ghi))
00708         {
00709             uiBut *but = BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(&ghi);
00710             if (but && ui_editsource_uibut_match(&ui_editsource_info->but_orig, but)) {
00711                 but_store = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&ghi);
00712                 break;
00713             }
00714 
00715         }
00716 
00717         if (but_store) {
00718             if (but_store->py_dbg_ln != -1) {
00719                 ret = editsource_text_edit(C, op,
00720                                            but_store->py_dbg_fn,
00721                                            but_store->py_dbg_ln);
00722             }
00723             else {
00724                 BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
00725                            "Active button isn't from a script, cant edit source.");
00726                 ret = OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00727             }
00728         }
00729         else {
00730             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
00731                        "Active button match can't be found.");
00732             ret = OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00733         }
00734 
00735 
00736         ui_editsource_active_but_clear();
00737 
00738         // printf("%s: end\n", __func__);
00739 
00740         return ret;
00741     }
00742     else {
00743         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Active button not found");
00744         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00745     }
00746 }
00747 
00748 static void UI_OT_editsource(wmOperatorType *ot)
00749 {
00750     /* identifiers */
00751     ot->name = "Reports to Text Block";
00752     ot->idname = "UI_OT_editsource";
00753     ot->description = "Edit source code for a button";
00754 
00755     /* callbacks */
00756     ot->exec = editsource_exec;
00757 }
00758 
00759 #endif /* WITH_PYTHON */

00762 /* Registration */
00763 
00764 void UI_buttons_operatortypes(void)
00765 {
00766     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_eyedropper);
00767     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_reset_default_theme);
00768     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_copy_data_path_button);
00769     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_reset_default_button);
00770     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_copy_to_selected_button);
00771     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_reports_to_textblock); // XXX: temp?
00772 
00773 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00774     WM_operatortype_append(UI_OT_editsource);
00775 #endif
00776 }
